Working makes life better.

Cease to struggle and you cease to live.

I am Yong Yuan, a data engineer in meituan. I completed my master's degree in University of Chinese Academy of Sciences on June 22, 2016 and bachelor's degree in Faculty of Science at Xidian University of science and technology of the electronics information on July 1，2013.

My work interests cover Data Minging, Content-based Image Retrieval, Computer Vision, Web Development Based on Django, and Scientific Computing with Python.

I'm a big fan of MAC, Git/willard-yuan, Linux, Python, Django. In my free time, I dive into writing blog, translating english book about technology, reading books to improve myself.
